citations.narrative:
There were several broken welds noted in the 2”x 4” wire mesh that is attached on the inside surface of the wooden fence
of the outdoor domestic hoofstock, llama, and alpaca pen. The damaged wire was noted in section of the fence that is
near the public parking area. The broken welds of wire were projecting into the pen and had sharp points that could cause
an injury to the animals.
Per this Section, outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the
animals from injury. The Licensee needs to make repairs to or replace the damaged section of the wire fence. Correct by
5/1/23.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
There were several broken welds noted in the 2”x 4” wire mesh that is attached on the inside surface of the wooden fence 
of the outdoor domestic hoofstock, llama, and alpaca pen. The damaged wire was noted in section of the fence that is 
near the public parking area. The broken welds of wire were projecting into the pen and had sharp points that could cause 
an injury to the animals. 
 
Per this Section, outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the 
animals from injury. The Licensee needs to make repairs to or replace the damaged section of the wire fence. Correct by 
5/1/23. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
